short_summary: Need 1 portable radio frequency spectrum monitoring unit with possible additional units and training services.
description: Original solicitation request: provide portable radio frequency spectrum monitoring units with associated training services.  Additionally, wishing to implement environmentally conscious packaging practices.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Visa W6448-23C003 - Portable Radio Frequency Spectrum Monitoring Unit 2

**Notice No.** *WS3810010676-Doc4099484381*

**Publication Date** | November 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date** | February 13, 2024 14:00 EST
**Amendment Date** | February 01, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date** | December 29, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date** | July 31, 2023

### Project Description

Department of National Defence requires a Portable Radio Frequency Spectrum Monitoring Unit capable of use in domestic and deployed operations with an option to purchase an estimated three more units within 24 months. Training services for the unit(s) are also required. Delivery must be made within three months after Contract Award.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements are applicable for: Ontario (except NCR)**

### Reference Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3810010676
* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Details**:
   + Name: Nimuan, Kat (SPAC/PSPC)
   + Email: [Kat.Nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Kat.Nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
   + Phone: None
   + Fax: None

### Tender Description

Bidders/Offerors/Suppliers are encouraged to use environmentally preferable packaging for all packaged goods to be delivered to the end user as part of this procurement. Please ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 13 February 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.

You can find the complete tender notice [here](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18097853?extsite=MTgwOTc4NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

### Amendment to Closing Time

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 13 February 202
